<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Winlas (The Elder of Divinity)](/Deities.aspx?ID=131)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 128 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Empyreal Lords
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=10)

**Edicts** Serve leaders of ceremonies, craft ceremonial arms and armor, lead a congregation

**Anathema** Deride sacred ceremonies, carelessly or lazily perform rituals, destroy ceremonial objects

**Follower Alignments**
LG, LN, NG

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)

**Favored Weapon** [Mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=7)

**Domains** [Glyph](/Domains.aspx?ID=46), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=17), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=27), [Vigil](/Domains.aspx?ID=55)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Share Lore](/Spells.aspx?ID=584)

- **2nd**
[Comprehend Language](/Spells.aspx?ID=46)

- **4th**
[Veil](/Spells.aspx?ID=355)

</column>
name: Winlas (The Elder of Divinity)
